mapper.insert: insert into sms_essay(mentor_num, essay_num, essay_subject, essay_summary, essay_content, essay_date, essay_img) values(mentor_num_seq.nextval, essay_num_seq.nextval, #{essay_subject}, #{essay_summary}, #{essay_content}, sysdate, #{essay_img})
mapper.select: select essay_img from sms_essay where essay_num=#{essay_num }
mapper.update: update sms_essay set essay_subject = '#{essay_subject}', essay_summary = '#{essay_summary}, essay_content = '#{essay_content}', essay_date = sysdate
